Name: Ripe Tomato Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Ripe Tomato that can double-jump.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Ripe Tomato that can double-jump. Double-click a location on the World Map and you will automatically fly to the destination by following the navigation. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, such as Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Ripe Tomato that can double-jump.
